DOC.brief_title: A Study Patients With Major Depression
DOC.criteria: Meet criterion major depressive disorder ( MDD ) without psychotic feature . Have education level degree understand patient communicate site study personnel . Judged reliable agree keep appointment clinic visit , test , procedure , include venipuncture , examination require protocol . Have additional , ongoing psychiatric condition major depression dysthymia consider primary diagnosis within 6 month Visit 1 . Have lifetime history Bipolar I II Disorder , psychotic disorder , factitious disorder . Are judged high risk imminently harm others . Have serious medical illness , include cardiovascular , hepatic , respiratory , hematologic , endocrinologic , neurologic disease , clinically significant laboratory ECG abnormality . Clinically significant lab abnormality , judgment investigator , indicate serious medical problem require intervention . Have diagnose medical condition could exacerbate treatment LY2216684 include hypertension , increased heart rate , arrhythmia , heart disease , narrow angle glaucoma , urinary hesitancy .
